1:
Listen, Yahweh, and answer me,\q for I am poor and oppressed.
\q
2:
Protect me, for I am loyal;\q my God, save your servant who trusts in you.


\q
3:
Be merciful to me, Lord,\q for I cry out to you all day long.
\q
4:
Make your servant glad,\q for to you, Lord, I pray.


\q
5:
You, Lord, are good, and ready to forgive,\q and you show great mercy to all those who cry out to you.
\q
6:
Yahweh, listen to my prayer;\q hear the sound of my pleas.
\q
7:
In the day of my trouble I call on you,\q for you will answer me.


\q
8:
There is no one who compares to you among the gods, Lord.\q There are no deeds like your deeds.
\q
9:
All the nations that you have made will come and bow before you, Lord.\q They will honor your name.


\q
10:
For you are great and do wonderful things;\q you only are God.
\q
11:
Teach me your ways, Yahweh. Then I will walk in your truth.\q Unite my heart to reverence you.
\q
12:
Lord my God, I will praise you with my whole heart;\q I will glorify your name forever.


\q
13:
For great is your covenant faithfulness toward me;\q you have rescued my life from the depths of Sheol.
\q
14:
God, the arrogant have risen up against me.\q A gang of violent men seek my life.
\q They have no regard for you.


\q
15:
But you, Lord, are a merciful and gracious God,\q slow to anger, and abundant in covenant faithfulness and trustworthiness.
\q
17:
Show me a sign of your favor.\q Then those who hate me will see it and be put to shame
\q because you, Yahweh, have helped me and comforted me.
